      Directory()
      Constructor that initializes the studentList, calls readData() and stores the average age of the current directory

    • Field Detail

      • studentList

        private java.util.List<Person> studentList
        Private ArrayList of Person objects. Used to store directory of students

      • averageAge

        private double averageAge
        Private double that stores the average age of all students in the directory

      • dataFile

        private java.lang.String dataFile
        Private string that contains the file name and path of the directory data

    • Constructor Detail

      • Directory

        public Directory()
        Constructor that initializes the studentList, calls readData() and stores the average age of the current directory

    • Method Detail

      • addStudent

        public void addStudent(java.lang.String firstName,
                       java.lang.String lastName,
                       int age,
                       java.lang.String majorCode,
                       java.lang.String studentID)
        Public function that takes in a students identifying information, creates a new person object and initializes the data, then stores the new person in the studentList. Calls updateAveAge() and writeData() after adding the new student.
        Parameters:
        firstName - a String containing the first name of the new student
        lastName - a String containing the last name of the new student
        age - an int containing the age of the new student
        majorCode - a String containing the major of the new student - written in University code
        studentID - a String containing the student ID of the new student

      • listContent

        public java.lang.String listContent()
        Public function that stores the information of each person in student list in a formatted string, and returns said string
        Returns:
        a formatted string containing the information of each person in studentList

      • getAverageAge

        public double getAverageAge()
        Public function that returns the average age of all the students in the directory
        Returns:
        averageAge

      • readData

        private void readData()
        Creates a new FileReader and Scanner based on the data file. Adds each student from the data file to the studentList

      • writeData

        private void writeData(Person p)
        Appends the data of a new person object to the data file and saves the file.
        Parameters:
        p - the Person object that was most recently added to the directory

      • calculateAveAge

        private void calculateAveAge()
        calculates the average age of every student in the directory

      • updateAveAge

        private void updateAveAge(int newAge)
        Updates averageAge when a new student is added to the directory. Eliminates the need to traverse the whole list after adding a new student.
        Parameters:
        newAge - the age of the new student added to the directory
